item.title: Entry Software | Integrated project management, service desk and resource management software.
item.description: Developers of TeamHeadquarters an all-in-one IT work management solution for SMB's that includes help desk, project management, scheduling and timesheets.

item.title: TeamHeadquarters Overview
item.description: TeamHeadquarters features are inclusive with every purchase; no addon's required.

item.title: Service Desk | TeamHeadquarters
item.description: TeamHeadquarters integrated service desk solution, provides help desk, asset management, queue management, customer self serve portal and reports.

item.title: Project Management | TeamHeadquarters
item.description: TeamHeadquarters integrated project management solution, provides project tickets, tasks, staffing, reporting and status updates and is integrated with the Customer Self Service Portal and reports.
